resources.string: Coffee so good,\nyour taste buds \nwill love it.
The best grain, the finest roast, the \npowerful flavor.
A cappuccino is an approximately 150 ml (5 oz) beverage, with 25 ml of espresso coffee and 85ml of fresh milk the fo.. Read More

"A cappuccino is an approximately 150 ml (5 oz) beverage, with 25 ml of espresso coffee and 85 ml of fresh milk. The foamy milk on top, often decorated with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon, gives cappuccino its distinctive appearance and rich flavor."
